<http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/blogspot/hsDu/~3/xFEJ12ooDeo/growing-android-tv-engagement-with.html|Growing Android TV engagement with search and recommendations>
Posted by Maru Ahues, Media Developer Advocate

When it comes to TV, content is king. But to enjoy great content, you first need to find it. We created Android TV with that in mind: a truly smart TV should deliver interesting content to users. Today, <https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.epix.epix|EPIXÂ®> joins a growing list of apps that use the Android TV platform to make it easy to enjoy movies, TV shows, sports highlights, music videos and more.
